title: winning Lotto numbers for Thursday
text:
It's been a big week for Lottery players in the UK, with the largest ever winner coming forward to grab the Euromillions prize today.

And tonight is another chance to win a life-changing sum of money.

The National Lottery Set For Life draw will take place at 8pm tonight and you could win £10,000 every month for the next 30 years.

If you stick with us we'll bring you the results here as soon as the draw is made. Scroll down to get the numbers as they come in.

In case you missed it, the numbers from Monday's Set For Life draw were 25, 33, 41, 17, 29 and the life ball was 2.

Meanwhile the winning numbers from last night's midweek UK National Lottery were - 14, 22, 40, 44, 55, 58 and the bonus ball was 12.

No-one won big so next Saturday will be a quadruple rollover with £11.2million on offer.

Set For Life is a relatively new game and is proving to be a hit. With an incredible top prize of £10,000 landing in your bank account every month and this lasting for a whopping 30 years - it's no wonder.

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

Five people have won big since the new competition was created earlier in 2019.

Other prizes include £10,000 every month for the next year for matching just five numbers or £250 for matching four balls and the 'Life Ball'.

It may not be in the same league as the £170million Euromillions prize won on Tuesday night - but these jackpots are big by UK Lotto standards and could make you one of the top earners in the UK.

Let's get on with tonight's draw - follow the action below. Get those tickets to hand - and good luck!
description: The jackpot in tonight's Set For Life draw from the National Lottery is a life-changing £10,000 every month for the next 30 years
